articles.title: Germany: Mass evacuation underway before WWII bomb defusing
articles.description: BERLIN (AP) — Thousands of people had to evacuate Sunday in the western Germany city of Dortmund as experts prepared to defuse as many as four bombs from World War II.
articles.content:
BERLIN (AP) Thousands of people had to evacuate Sunday in the western Germany city of Dortmund as experts prepared to defuse as many as four bombs from World War II.
Authorities already had evacuated two hospitals Saturday and opened schools for residents wh… [+595 chars]

articles.title: Pope baptizes 32 babies in Sistine Chapel, marvels at quiet
articles.description: VATICAN CITY (AP) — Pope Francis has baptized 32 babies, including two sets of twins, in the splendor of the Sistine Chapel.
articles.content:
VATICAN CITY (AP) Pope Francis has baptized 32 babies, including two sets of twins, in the splendor of the Sistine Chapel.
Francis marveled that the babies were very quiet, with barely a peep as they waited their turn to be baptized Sunday morning under the … [+657 chars]

articles.author: By JOSEPH KRAUSS Associated Press
articles.title: Iran braces for protests after admitting plane shootdown
articles.description: DUBAI, United Arab Emirates (AP) — Iran deployed riot police in the capital on Sunday expecting possible protests after its Revolutionary Guard admitted to accidentally shooting down a passenger plane at a time of soaring tensions with the United States.
articles.content:

articles.title: Hong Kong rally seeks international support for movement
articles.description: HONG KONG (AP) — More than a thousand people attended a rally in Hong Kong on Sunday to urge people and governments abroad to support the city's pro-democracy movement and oppose China's ruling Communist Party.
articles.content:
HONG KONG (AP) More than a thousand people attended a rally in Hong Kong on Sunday to urge people and governments abroad to support the city's pro-democracy movement and oppose China's ruling Communist Party.

articles.title: Police: 3 juveniles, 2 adults wounded in Colorado shooting
articles.description: AURORA, Colo. (AP) — Three juveniles and two adults were shot and wounded in Colorado, police said early Sunday.
articles.content:
AURORA, Colo. (AP) Three juveniles and two adults were shot and wounded in Colorado, police said early Sunday.

articles.title: Lawmaker, son of ex-president, to be Malta's next premier

articles.title: World leaders travel to Oman to meet its newly named sultan
articles.description: DUBAI, United Arab Emirates (AP) — World leaders traveled Sunday to Oman to meet the country's new sultan, named just a day earlier after the death of the nation's longtime ruler Sultan Qaboos bin Said.
